description
meta.content: We are the only free public Montessori charter for elementary and middle school grades 1st-8th in Corpus Christi Texas.
We are the only free public Montessori charter for elementary and middle school grades 1st-8th in Corpus Christi Texas.

span.span: The administration will continue to monitor the situation regarding the Coronavirus and keep our community updated via this website, Facebook, Remind, and email. Please make sure the school has your most up to date contact information. Check often for updates.

span.span: Preparing for the brightest future, CC-Montessori provides a safe but driving space for students to excel. Our teachers are Montessori trained and understand that teaching must begin and end with the whole child in mind. This requires dedication and commitment to students and their variety of needs, passions, and dreams. We strive to create a community of educators, parents, and guardians that value the education and growth of the body, spirits, and minds of the children. Explore our website to learn more about us.
Applications for 4th-7th go on the waiting list.
CC-Montessori Admission Applications are still being taken. You may drop off in person or email directly to ada@cc-montessori.org
Please see our Admissions tab for more details!

span.br: At our school, children learn by discovery. They are joyful and confident. Building communities and nurturing the environment. Our children become ambassadors to the world.

span.span: Click the button below to view a PDF of our community and teacher wish lists. Anything you can give is of great help. Thank you for supporting our school!
OUR SCHOOL YEAR AT A GLANCE

div.p: As a public charter school, we receive fewer funds per student than our big district friends. We also receive no funding from bonds that support the city district. This means we must fundraise to help build the facilities and equipment our students need.
We are currently in need of a cover for our basketball court to protect our students from the brutal Texas sun.

a.span: Call Our School to Make a Tax Deductable Gift

p.span: 822 Ayers St, Corpus Christi, TX 78404, USA
